title: All that jazz starring Kenny Ball and his Jazzmen
brief_description: Documentary film featuring Kenny Ball and his Jazzmen performing live on stage interspersed with personal anecdotes by Kenny Ball about his life on the road as a jazz musician. The music is great, from dixieland to gospel, and includes the memorable “Midnight in Moscow” along with “When the Saints go marching in”, “We shall not be moved” and many other jazz favourites. No credits available.
